boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: D-Day
Axis and Allies: D-Day
boardgame.description: From the Avalon Hill web site:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s the morning of June 6, 1944. As Allied forces prepare to storm Normandy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s beaches, the fate of Europe is in your hands! In honor of next year_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s 60th anniversary of D-Day, Avalon Hill will release Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies D-Day, a new, stand-alone extension of the classic strategy game Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies D-Day will allow players to recreate the largest amphibious invasion in history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies D-Day features detailed game components including a new blockhouse piece, an extra-large game board, and original artwork commissioned exclusively for the D-Day game box. Other elements of this new Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies variant include a card deck with three card types -- Orders, Tactics, and Fortune -- to add depth and complexity to play. Order cards determine play sequence and break turns into distinct phases; Tactics cards offer players varied strategic opportunities; and Fortune cards add an element of unpredictability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies D-Day begins as Operation Overlord, the invasion of German-held Normandy, is underway -- 130,000 soldiers of the United Kingdom, Canada, and the United States are poised to assault Fortress Europe. You and your fellow world powers control their fates._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One player controls Germany, whose Axis forces have turned the beaches of Normandy into a near-impenetrable stronghold. Set to breach those defenses are the Allies: the United Kingdom, Canada, and the United States. The future of Europe and the world hangs in the balance._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies D-Day is designed for two or three players and can be played in two hours. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies D-Day is the third Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies variant, following the successful Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Europe and Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Pacific, both of which were published in 2001._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2004 Origins Awards Gamers’ Choice Award Winner
2005 Årets Spill Best Strategy Game Nominee

I received it new but have never played it because my friends aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t really into war-themed games. All components are punched, included, and in perfect condition. The box is also flawless. Will ship at whatever it costs to send USPS priority mail with shipping confirmation (or via another company if you request and pay shipping costs). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m relatively new to selling on BGG so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve included a link to my eBay rating: http://feedback.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewFeedback2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;userid=thecrisper_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ftab=AllFeedback

Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies ® D-DAY ™ ____________________ 6 JUNE 1944 ____________________ THE FATE OF EUROPE DEPENDS UPON YOUR COURAGE # A Tactical Game by Larry Harris # Wizards of the Coast # Avalon Hill # © 2004 Hasbro # AGES: 12+ # For 2 to 3 Players # _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; NEW BLOCKHOUSE PIECES _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; You are on the beaches of Normandy, and ahead lies an uncertain future. The fate of the world hangs in the balance, as you struggle for control over the cities of CHERBOURG, ST. LO, and CAEN. Savage, quick and decisive, D-Day was the major turning point in the European theater, with liberty itself on the line. Designed for 2 to 3 players, Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: D-Day ™ accurately captures this dramatic conflict and places you squarely in the middle of one of the greatest battles of the 20th century. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; This game is complete including the instructions. The contents are in very good condition. The box has one taped corner, minor edgewear, clear tape around the bottom and edges and several tape removal marks. The price is: $ 18.00 plus the shipping cost _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; handling fee listed below: Shipping and Handling Fee for Games The shipping and handling cost on this game to locations in the Contiguous US 48 states is $ 10.00 to be added to the cost of the game. Add any other game from our online store (when ordered within 24 hours of this game) (which do not have a greater shipping and handling cost) for an additional shipping and handling cost of only $ 3.00 per game plus, obviously, the cost of the game or games. :-)
Played two games, everything in mint condition.

** NOT A COMPLETE GAME ** Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: D-Day Wizards of the Coast/Avalon Hill 2004 Includes 20_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 33_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; game board; 24-page rule book; battle board; 48 cards (the rules say 48 Tactical cards, but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s really 16 tactical cards, 16 order cards, 16 fortune cards); 3 reinforcement charts; 8 dice; cardboard trays; and most of the pieces... 101 of 115 infantry units: 28 US, 28 UK, 47 Germany 58 of 62 artillery units: 14 US, 12 UK, 32 Germany 33 of 37 tank units: 5 US, 6 UK, 22 Germany 16 of 17 blockhouse units: 16 Germany 5 of 8 fighter units: 3 US, 2 UK 1 of 2 bomber units: 1 UK Box has minor wear - price tag residue, paper tear at the corners, slight creasing - and one split corner on the lid. (20)
